references.paper_title: Flamingo: a visual language model for few-shot learning
references.reason: This paper introduces a visual language model that is foundational to the current work, demonstrating how to leverage multimodal capabilities to improve reasoning performance.

references.paper_title: Large language models are zero-shot reasoners
references.reason: This paper establishes the idea that LLMs can perform zero-shot reasoning, which is the basis for the current paper's approach to latent reasoning.

references.paper_title: Chain-of-thought prompting elicits reasoning in large language models
references.reason: This paper demonstrates how chain-of-thought prompting enhances reasoning in LLMs, providing the initial inspiration for this paper's exploration of latent reasoning.
This paper introduces recurrent independent mechanisms which inspires the approach of this paper.
This paper's approach to latent reasoning is very similar to the proposed approach in this paper.
